SELECT count(*) From Board AS B LEFT OUTER JOIN User AS U on (B.user_id = U.user_id) WHERE B.category_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT count(*) From Board AS B LEFT OUTER JOIN User AS U on (B.user_id = U.user_id) WHERE B.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT B.board_id AS "BoardId", B.title AS "BoardTitle", B.contents AS "BoardContents", B.hit AS "BoardHit", B.created_date AS "BoardCreatedDate", B.updated_date AS "BoardUpdatedDate", U.user_id AS "UserId", U.email AS "UserEmail", U.nickname AS "UserNickName", U.created_date AS "UserCreatedDate", U.role AS "UserRole", C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", CM.comment_id AS "CommentId", CM.title AS "CommentTitle", CM.contents AS "CommentContents", CM.level AS "CommentLevel", CM.created_date AS "CommentCreatedDate", CM.updated_date AS "CommentUpdatedDate", CU.user_id AS "CommentUserId", CU.email AS "CommentUserEmail", CU.nickname AS "CommentUserNickName", CU.created_date AS "UserCreatedDate", CU.role AS "CommentUserRole" FROM Board AS B LEFT OUTER JOIN User AS U on (B.user_id = U.user_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS C on (B.category_id = C.category_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN comment AS CM on (B.board_id = CM.board_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN user AS CU on (CM.user_id = CU.user_id) WHERE B.board_id = #{id} limit 0,10;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board ( title, contents, user_id, hit, category_id, created_date, updated_date ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{creator.userId}, 0, #{category.id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET title = #{board.title}, contents = #{board.contents}, updated_date = now() WHERE board_id = #{id};
UPDATE board SET hit = hit +1 WHERE board_id = #{id};
